column5: I was wondering if anybody had been perch fishing here recently. We are going up there next week what was going on. Any replies woud be greatly appreciated. Thanks, Walleye

Pelican Lake is always a sure bet for a good perch bite, but I haven't been there for awhile. Lake Manitoba made the top 5 perch lakes in north america, however I have never been there so maybe some others here might be able to help.Fish ON!!
lake manitoba has been cranking out good fishbring your extension...straight north of portage la prairie at delta...rock and pelican have been slow from what i have heard
